name: Individual Investigations in Sculpture
description: Students produce a coherent body of self-directed artwork based on independent research and written proposals. In-progress and completed artworks are discussed in a peer critique setting. Students write an artist statement of their intentions and procedures, prepare a Canadian and international MFA program presentation, and document their artwork. [144P]
prerequisites: FAS348Y5 or FAS349Y5 or FAS359Y5 or FAS369Y5, 1.5 credits in FAH/VCC and P.I.
